casebody.data:
GUS SCLAFANI CORPORATION, Appellant, v. VIOLET PACKING COMPANY, Appellee. No. 02-1351. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Jan. 10, 2003. Rehearing and rehearing en banc denied Feb. 19, 2003.

Before CLEVENGER, RADER, and GAJARSA, Circuit Judges.

*501Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
